name: The Hole (Eulogic)
description:
This is a retro arcade 2D platformer game created within 48 hrs for the Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam. It was written entirely from scratch in C and OpenGL and uses platform independent libraries. This release, however, is only available for MacOS.

The source code is available in github so you can try the game if you don't have a Mac

https://github.com/LogicEu/TheHole-LudumDare48-
